explains: adj. 第三代移动通信技术的

sentences.en: Thanks to the company's increasing third-generation, China Unicom Ltd saw new profits.
sentences.cn: 由于第三代产品的产量日益增加，中国联通公司看到了新的利润。

sentences.en: By the second or third generation, such old-fashioned attitudes are generally forgotten.
sentences.cn: 到了第二代或第三代，这种守旧的态度通常会被遗忘。
